name: Techmate
long_description: Techmate offers simple, on-demand tech support for small businesses and startups. With fast appointment booking, transparent pricing, and friendly, trusted technicians, we aim to take the frustration out of tech support. Get onsite or virtual tech support in as little as 2 hours.
one_liner: A technology concierge for your home. We provide on-demand support…

name: JuziBot
long_description:
JuziBot is a startup that provides smart marketing and sales services for customers on WeChat platform, the company helps SMBs build secure and stable key opinion customer (KOC) channels, as well as helps corporate clients with customer acquisition and sales conversion. JuziBot currently serves customers in education, insurance, healthcare, and a few other industries, some of the clients include Meituan Dianping, Digital China, Zuoyebang, etc., and 80% of these existing customers have been acquired through word of mouth. JuziBot's products have been known to improve the sales experience for one million sales professionals on a daily basis. 

The company is invested by a number of leading VCs including PreAngel, Plug and Play, Y Combinator, TSVC, and Alpha Startups. JuziBot received the CCFA Retail Technology Rising Enterprise Award in 2018. In 2018 and 2019, respectively, the company won the 1st place in both of the task-based human-machine dialogue response naturalness, and the chat-type human-machine dialogue assessment in the SMP Chinese Human-Machine Dialogue Technology Evaluation held by the Chinese Information Processing Society of China (CIPSC).
one_liner: Intercom for WeChat, help companies to acquire,  engage, retain…

name: Community Phone Company
long_description:
Community Phone is building the best phone for communities in America. We are your hair salon’s business phone, how your auto-body shop texts you or gets appointments, your local government agency’s operations line, and your mom’s phone that she sometimes answers on her computer. We have more than 20,000 customers today, and are building the Square of phones.

Our team is ~80 people strong, across 15 countries. We are growing quickly, backed by Y Combinator Accelerator and Y Combinator’s Continuity Fund. We are customer-obsessed to the core. When we had a major network outage, everyone from recruiters to engineers to marketers to customer support agents got on the phone with our customers. Our team exemplifies our purpose. Join us on our mission to make it as easy as possible for people and people at organizations in our communities to communicate.
one_liner: The best phone for communities in America

name: FirstSupport.ai
long_description: FirstSupport is an AI-powered assistant for customer support. We give AI superpowers to support agents so they can reply quicker, understand multiple languages, get information quickly from knowledge base, summarize ticket in one click, get weekly customer support report, and many more. Available on Zendesk.
one_liner: AI Assistant for Customer Support

name: Chatwoot
long_description: Chatwoot is an AI-powered customer support platform that enables businesses to deliver exceptional support experiences. Built as a modern, open-source, and self-hosted alternative to tools like Intercom and Zendesk, Chatwoot brings all your customer conversations into one place. You can connect email, website live chat, social media accounts, WhatsApp, and more, making it easy to manage every interaction from a single, unified platform.
one_liner: The modern, open source, self-hosted AI customer support platform

name: Atlas
long_description:
Atlas is a modern, all-in-one customer support platform that is built with AI first. We help you solve your customers problems faster by understanding them more completely with a suite of customer tools like session recording, bug tracking, and event feeds. You can think of us as the next generation Zendesk / Intercom combined with Log Rocket and Linear.

Learn More: https://atlas.so/

Products:
- Chat Widget
- Ticketing
- Omni channel Support (chat, email, WhatsApp, Slack Connect, and SMS)
- Customer Timeline
- Session Recording
- Help Center
- AI Chatbot
- Customer Insights
one_liner: Modern customer support platform replacement for Intercom and Zendesk

name: Sero
one_liner: Customer onboarding built for B2B SaaS

name: Vessel
long_description:
Vessel is the developer-first, native integration platform for GTM tools. We make it easy for developers to integrate with your customer’s CRMs, Sales Engagement, Marketing Automation, Chat, Dialers, and more. Integrate in different ways customized for your use cases: 

- Speed: Use our Unified APIs to roll out many integrations quickly through a common data model and unified interface.
- Depth: Use our actions API to build deeper integrations when working with entities custom to each app.
- Ease: Use ETL to let us handle pulling and pushing customer data to your DB
- Extensible: Support any integrations through our open-source integrations library

Breadth and depth, make your integrations limitless.
one_liner: Developer-first, native integration platform for GTM tools

name: Fogbender
long_description:
Fogbender helps B2B companies support customer teams: think Intercom meets Slack's shared channels.

Today, all customer software is explicitly or implicitly designed for helping individuals, not teams. This is forcing B2B companies - who sell products to teams, not individuals - to augment their default customer support platform (Zendesk, Intercom, Front, etc) with a second, "unofficial", system: Slack's shared channels.

This causes a number of operational and logistical difficulties for both vendors and their customers, resulting in added costs, inefficiencies, and lost opportunities.

With Fogbender, B2B vendors embed a team-to-team messaging widget directly on their customer dashboard, where all users belonging to an account can - with no additional authentication - 1) see a list of currently-open issues 2) participate in conversations with their own team and the vendor, and 3) search all historical discussions.
one_liner: Customer support tool purpose-built for companies that sell APIs

name: Nara
long_description: We make it easy for small and medium businesses to build an AI sales agents for their websites and social media, augmenting their sales capacity. This assistant provides personalized shopping recommendations to customers and is available 24/7 to answer their questions.
one_liner: Answer 70% of your support and sales questions. Instantly

name: SigmaMind AI
long_description: SigmaMind AI is an AI platform to automate customer support for BPOs and Call-centers. We help brands and call-centers automate their entire customer support lifecycle - replying, tagging, and closing tickets faster than ever before.
one_liner: AI agent platform for Call Centers

name: Zoltar Labs
all_locations: New York, NY, USA; Mountain View, CA, USA
one_liner: AI-assisted CX tool built with your knowledge.

name: Unthread
long_description:
Unthread is an AI-powered helpdesk built natively into Slack. We help companies to automate the creation and resolution of tickets right from a Slack channel.

We work with IT, HR, and CX teams at some of the world's largest companies to resolve tickets instantly using AI.
one_liner: Agentic service management in Slack

name: Syncly
long_description: We help CX and the product team to get product insights and help proactively engage with their customers before they churn by auto-analyzing all the customer communications. Our team previously founded and sold a $200M AI technology startup.
one_liner: AI to auto-analyze all your customer communications

name: Parabolic
long_description:
Parabolic is an AI assistant that autodrafts ready-to-send responses for your customer support team. 

Equip your team with the best possible response at their fingertips.
one_liner: AI assistant for customer support

name: OpenSight
all_locations: San Francisco, CA, USA; Sunnyvale, CA, USA; Remote
long_description: OpenSight helps companies quickly scale up their support function and resolve customers' questions much faster. With the latest advancement in LLMs, OpenSight offers accurate answers and action resolution paths resolving >70% of inbound customer inquiries.
one_liner: AI-powered customer support automation for fast-growing companies

name: Gluetrail
long_description:
Gluetrail is a chrome extension that allows you to create support/training/marketing assets 10x faster, just from a screen and audio recording. These assets allow you to drive software or process adoption & awareness among prospects, customers or teammates.  

From one single recording, Gluetrail leverages your screen+clicks+audio transcript, and AI, to:
- automatically create step-by-step articles with screenshots and videos
- adapt the content for & publish it on 3rd party platforms in 1 click: internal or external knowledge bases (Notion, Confluence, Intercom, Zendesk...), community platforms and social media (linkedin, youtube, twitter, discourse...)
one_liner: Create step by step articles with screenshots and videos 10x faster

name: Inkeep
long_description:
Inkeep provides all the AI tools teams need to scale support: an assistant for users, a copilot for support agents, and an AI writer to identify and fix content gaps. 

Teams like Anthropic, Pinecone, and Postman trust Inkeep to help their users find what they need and get high quality human support when they need it.

Inkeep "just works" with your existing tools - ingest any source, add to any help center or docs site, integrate with any ticketing platform, and our APIs to create custom experiences and automate workflows.
one_liner: AI support you can trust.

name: Ariglad
long_description:
Founded in Vancouver, British Columbia, Ariglad The first AI platform that integrates with support channels and release notes to auto-maintain your knowledge base. Ariglad suggests new articles, updates existing ones, detects duplicates, and merges them. Basically, it puts your knowledge base maintenance on auto-pilot.

This is led by Co-Founders Sophie and Ali. They are both completely obsessed with this problem and their customers, who have partnered with Ariglad to become immensely more efficient.
one_liner: Knowledge base maintenance on auto-pilot

name: Pylon
long_description:
Pylon is the modern alternative to Zendesk, Intercom, Freshdesk, and Salesforce Service Cloud. We help B2B companies track customer support issues across common B2B channels including shared Slack channels (Slack Connect), Microsoft Teams, email, in-app chat, ticket forms, Slack community, and more.

Hundreds of fast-growing YC companies of all sizes like Vellum, Hightouch, and Deel are customers.

Learn more at usepylon.com
one_liner: The only customer support platform built for B2B.

name: Yuma AI
long_description:
## What is Yuma AI?

Yuma is automating customer support by providing an AI Support Agent orchestration platform. Yuma provides autonomous AI agents dedicated to customer service and e-commerce.

We integrate directly with help desk software (Zendesk, Kustomer, Gorgias, etc.) and focus on helping large Shopify brands deal with their high volume of support requests.

Top merchants using Yuma can automate up to 80% of their support tickets fully autonomously.

## Why do Shopify merchants need Yuma?

There are thousands of large Shopify merchants around the world generating $10M+ a year. Most of them have taken over some niches and are great at what they do: selling their products.

But they all have one thing in common: they all hate customer support. It's a burden for them and a huge source of cost, as they receive hundreds of requests per day. Some of them have dozens of support agents on staff, usually offshore, and the overall quality is still often pretty poor while staff turnover remains high.

Those merchants have been promised automation for years but have always been disappointed by the outcome. As customers, we have all had to live through a terrible support automation experience before, so this is no secret, and everyone knows that the current state of the technology is quite bad.

## Yuma is solving this in a few ways:

Yuma isn't just another RAG chatbot. Our platform provides autonomous AI agents dedicated to support and ecommerce.

These agents are powered by knowledge, follow processes, and are managed by our in-house AI orchestration technology. This ensures safety, control, and quality at every step.

We believe that to truly automate customer support, we must develop a platform that mimics the actions of a human support agent. That's exactly what we've been doing.

Currently, our top merchants are automating 60% of their support tickets through Yuma. Yuma can fetch information from external services and take actions in other apps as needed to resolve each ticket.

We are laser-focused on building the best AI support agent platform and aim to achieve 80% true automation in the next few months.

## Fun Fact

Yuma got started by accident. This is my third YC startup after Socialcam (W12) and Triplebyte (S15). I released Yuma as a prototype for fun in mid-December 2022 and was overwhelmed with demo requests. That's when I knew I was onto something and had to turn this into a real company, once again.
one_liner: The AI Support Agent for Ecommerce

name: Minded
all_locations: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
long_description: Generate AI agents with plain English, edit visually, customize with code in your own IDE. Currently automating millions of tasks across support, sales, finance and more for companies like eToro, Payoneer and JustEat.
one_liner: Cursor for AI Agents

name: Duckie
long_description:
Duckie lets customer support teams build their own AI agents in minutes! 

With Duckie, support teams can translate their tasks and processes into predictable and reliable AI workflows that saves them time and money. Folks use Duckie to handle a wide range of use cases, from answers customers technical questions to processing refunds, and everything in between.
one_liner: Build AI Support Agents in Minutes

name: Assembly
long_description: Assembly is a customer experience platform that turns customer feedback into product growth and support requests into long-lasting relationships.
one_liner: Build Magical Customer Experiences

name: 14.ai
long_description: 14.ai is a Zendesk alternative built from the ground up for AI agents. The Cursor for customer support.
one_liner: Customer support for 1000x teams

name: Open
long_description:
Open is an AI-powered, all-in-one customer support and communication platform — used in production by:

Print.com, Mollie.com, Viva.com, More.com, Orderchamp.com, OneCarNow.com, and other major enterprise companies.

We specialize in solving and automating complex support cases across email, web, phone, SMS, and WhatsApp.

We’re a research-based company currently working on releasing Support-Bench, the world’s most comprehensive AI customer support benchmark.

Our team consists of +3 programming language builders, a nationwide cybersecurity competition winner at age 16, and a dentist.
one_liner: Enterprise AI customer support

name: Conduit
long_description:
Conduit is the AI agent platform that drives conversational outcomes across support and sales.

Customer conversations are the backbone of every business. Mass-market consumer businesses spend nearly a third of their working hours calling and texting customers. Conduit turns those conversations into an engine for conversions, revenue, and cost savings. 

We enable operators across real estate, financials, and services, to build and deploy AI agents that perform better than your best employee. Our modular platform enables automation for the most complex, high-volume conversational workflows.
one_liner: Conversational AI agents for Support and Sales

name: Overstand Labs
long_description:
If you’re a founder and feel like you—or your exec team—are too far removed from the customer, Overstand is here to help. We’re the platform (and API) for your customer communications, turning Slack, emails, WhatsApp, call recordings, and more into actionable insights. For example, we can help you discover feature requests hidden in customer emails, spot upsell opportunities from a casual Slack message, or identify a critical support issue buried in a call transcript -- all without having to depend on others in your company to fill out a form or write meeting notes.

Get back to Founder Mode by spotting trends, uncovering growth opportunities, and staying deeply connected to your customers. Overstand makes it easy to understand where you’re needed most and take action that drives impact. 🚀
one_liner: We help business leaders get back into Founder Mode

name: Intryc
long_description: Consumer enterprises have millions of customer support tickets annually. They need to constantly evaluate support agents’ performance and compliance. Typically they evaluate less than 5% of those interactions manually which is slow, expensive and not scalable. Intryc's AI can evaluate 100% of all customer interactions, in real time, at half the cost.
one_liner: Intryc uses AI to automate quality assurance for customer support

name: PathPilot
long_description: Fintechs, banks, and other institutions managing financial services face constant pressure to reduce costs, enhance customer experience, and ensure regulatory compliance. PathPilot provides the speed of pre-built AI agents combined with the flexibility of full customization. This enables internal teams to remain in full control—designing, deploying, and governing AI solutions independently, without reliance on external vendors.
one_liner: AI platform helping fintech/bank teams scale efficiently

name: Rulebase
long_description: We build AI agents that help banks and fintechs QA 100% of customer interactions, flagging compliance breaches, high-risk issues, and quality gaps in real time. Our AI agent reviews calls, chats, and emails, then routes issues to the right teammates, cutting escalations by up to 30% and reducing QA review time from hours to minutes.
one_liner: AI quality assurance for financial services.

name: Lark
long_description:
Lark builds AI agents to handle billing operations. We’re starting by automating billing support and chargebacks for subscription companies. Vijit and Jack previously built the usage-based billing product at Stripe. We are working with four customers: Midjourney, Character AI,  Julius AI, and Joon App.

Automating billing actions is nuanced and risky, which is why general support agents like Intercom Fin struggle with it. We have heard this repeatedly from customers. At Lark, we build agents with deep billing integrations that factor in customer usage data, credits, prorations, and more – while ensuring strong guardrails for safe actions.

We want to be the AI layer on top of billing and are going after a $20B market opportunity in this space.
one_liner: AI Agents for Billing Operations

name: Minimal AI
long_description:
Minimal AI makes it easy for e-commerce brands to build and manage AI support teams that resolve 80% of tickets.

The result: reduced support costs while actually improving customer experience and sales. It feels like outsourcing your support to a team of AI Agents with human-like empathy.

Over 45 e-commerce brands use Minimal AI to handle thousands of customer support tickets daily.
one_liner: AI Customer Support Teams for E-commerce

name: Anytrace
long_description:
Anytrace is the first AI agent that automates the end-to-end workflow of a support engineer. Our agent resolves technical support tickets by interacting with customers, investigating root causes, and tracking issues to completion.

Sam (CEO) was previously the co-founder and CEO of a DevOps platform that raised $2M. Taira (CTO) was the youngest SDE 2 at AWS Sagemaker Inference. We have over five years of experience handling technical support for customers ranging from small startups to Fortune 500 companies like Salesforce.

We came into YC with just an idea, and we already have our first pilot customer paying $5 per support ticket.

Essentially every B2B software company devotes engineering time to support, and our goal is to automate this away.
one_liner: The AI support engineering agent
